name: Passerelle EU
legal: SPRL (Athronan Associates) operating as Passerelle public affairs
goal: Passerelle (www.passerelle-pa.com ) is a Brussels-based EU consultancy. We specialise in creating small, focused, flexible EU fora in a range of sectors bringing together all relevant stakeholders including citizens, business and policymakers in order to build trust, relationships, address and find practical solutions thus resulting in better policy making for all.  We are founders of and act as secretariat to the European Retail Financial Forum www.erff.eu  and the European Justice Stakeholders Forum www.ejsf.eu .
